name: Click Ninja (SKGamesIndie)
description:
Description

Click the object displayed at the top to earn 5 points. If you click on the wrong object you get just 1 point, but if you miss completely, you lose 1 point.

Focus your mind for 30 seconds to find correct Shapes, Letters, Numbers or even all of them at once and try to get the highest score.
